Oh, Okay…

50%
50%
Yess ! the servers getting on great now just doing gwars…
Any idea on how to make an
::empty code? NOT sure how, thanks mate AGAIN

LEGENDS OMG THANKS
SKAN YOU SEXY MAN

Omg. i been trying this for ages… AWW damn man you AWESOME
[/quote]

Good, now this is fixed. Edit your original post and instead of [quote-] [/quote-]
Use [code-] [/code-]

Without the dashes[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

/*if(itemId == 9747 || itemId == 9748 || itemId == 9749 || itemId == 9750 ||
            itemId == 9751 || itemId == 9752 || itemId == 9753 || 
            itemId == 9754 || itemId == 9755 || itemId == 9756 ||
            itemId == 9757 || itemId == 9758 || itemId == 9759 || itemId == 9760 || itemId == 9761 || itemId == 9762 || itemId == 9763 || itemId == 9764 || itemId == 9765 || itemId == 9766 || itemId == 9767 || itemId == 9768 || itemId == 9769 || itemId == 9770 || itemId == 9771 || itemId == 9772 || itemId == 9773 || itemId == 9774 || itemId == 9775 || itemId == 9776 || itemId == 9777 || itemId == 9778 || itemId == 9779 || itemId == 9780 || itemId == 9781 || itemId == 9782 || itemId == 9783 || itemId == 9784 || itemId == 9785 || itemId == 9786 || itemId == 9787 || itemId == 9788 || itemId == 9789 || itemId == 9790 || itemId == 9791 || itemId == 9792 || itemId == 9793 || itemId == 9794 || itemId == 9795 || itemId == 9796 || itemId == 9797 || itemId == 9798 || itemId == 9799 || itemId == 9800 || itemId == 9801 || itemId == 9802 || itemId == 9803 || itemId == 9804 || itemId == 9805 || itemId == 9806 || itemId == 9807 || itemId == 9808 || itemId == 9809 || itemId == 9810 || itemId == 9811 || itemId == 9812 || itemId == 9813 || itemId == 9814 || itemId == 9948 || itemId == 9949 || itemId == 9950 || itemId == 12524) {
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn SkillCapes.");
            p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0);

must be

if(itemId == 9747 || itemId == 9748 || itemId == 9749 || itemId == 9750 || itemId == 9751 || itemId == 9752 || itemId == 9753 || itemId == 9754 || itemId == 9755 || itemId == 9756 || itemId == 9757 || itemId == 9758 || itemId == 9759 || itemId == 9760 || itemId == 9761 || itemId == 9762 || itemId == 9763 || itemId == 9764 || itemId == 9765 || itemId == 9766 || itemId == 9767 || itemId == 9768 || itemId == 9769 || itemId == 9770 || itemId == 9771 || itemId == 9772 || itemId == 9773 || itemId == 9774 || itemId == 9775 || itemId == 9776 || itemId == 9777 || itemId == 9778 || itemId == 9779 || itemId == 9780 || itemId == 9781 || itemId == 9782 || itemId == 9783 || itemId == 9784 || itemId == 9785 || itemId == 9786 || itemId == 9787 || itemId == 9788 || itemId == 9789 || itemId == 9790 || itemId == 9791 || itemId == 9792 || itemId == 9793 || itemId == 9794 || itemId == 9795 || itemId == 9796 || itemId == 9797 || itemId == 9798 || itemId == 9799 || itemId == 9800 || itemId == 9801 || itemId == 9802 || itemId == 9803 || itemId == 9804 || itemId == 9805 || itemId == 9806 || itemId == 9807 || itemId == 9808 || itemId == 9809 || itemId == 9810 || itemId == 9811 || itemId == 9812 || itemId == 9813 || itemId == 9814 || itemId == 9948 || itemId == 9949 || itemId == 9950 || itemId == 12524) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn SkillCapes."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0);

and add more id’s of the items UNSPAWNABLE.
at the end remove all / and / lines.

item.title: How to make certain items unspawnable. [508]
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

I’m on a Paladino76 Source [508] and i dunno how to make…

*Items spawnable to everyone.
*Certain items unspawnable. (Like rares)

Here’s a code.

/* * Class Commands * * Version 1.0 * * Moday, August 18, 2008 * * Created by Palidino76 */

package palidino76.rs2.io.packets;

import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import palidino76.rs2.Server;
import palidino76.rs2.Engine;
import palidino76.rs2.player.combat.*;
import palidino76.rs2.player.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import palidino76.rs2.player.combat.PlayerSlayer;

public class Commands implements Packet {
/**
* Handles commands, chat text that starts with ::.
* @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
* @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
* @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
*/
public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
return;
}
try {
if (!Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) {
String playerCommand = p.stream.readString().toLowerCase();
String[] cmd = playerCommand.split(" ");
playerCommand.trim();
PlayerCombat playCb = new PlayerCombat§;
PlayerSlayer playSlay = new PlayerSlayer§;
p.updatePlayer(true);

	if (cmd[0].equals("givejad") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("drowning")) {
		String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
		Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
		if (p2 != null) {
		p2.disconnected[0] = false;
		p2.KillJad = 1;
		p.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You've been given the ability to wear a fire cape!");
		p2.updateReq = true;
		p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
	}
	}
	if (cmd[0].equals("slayertask") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cj")) {
		playSlay.appendTargetPicking();
	}
		if (cmd[0].equals("master")) {
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 1);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("pure")) {
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
		}

		if (cmd[0].equals("mypkpointz") && p.rights >= 0) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You currently have " +p.PKPointz+ " PKPointz.");
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
		int itemId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
		    if (p.rights <= 1) {
			/*if(itemId == 6570) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn a Fire Cape.");
			p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0);
			return;
			}*/
			/*if(itemId == 9747 || itemId == 9748 || itemId == 9749 || itemId == 9750 ||
			itemId == 9751 || itemId == 9752 || itemId == 9753 || 
			itemId == 9754 || itemId == 9755 || itemId == 9756 ||
			itemId == 9757 || itemId == 9758 || itemId == 9759 || itemId == 9760 || itemId == 9761 || itemId == 9762 || itemId == 9763 || itemId == 9764 || itemId == 9765 || itemId == 9766 || itemId == 9767 || itemId == 9768 || itemId == 9769 || itemId == 9770 || itemId == 9771 || itemId == 9772 || itemId == 9773 || itemId == 9774 || itemId == 9775 || itemId == 9776 || itemId == 9777 || itemId == 9778 || itemId == 9779 || itemId == 9780 || itemId == 9781 || itemId == 9782 || itemId == 9783 || itemId == 9784 || itemId == 9785 || itemId == 9786 || itemId == 9787 || itemId == 9788 || itemId == 9789 || itemId == 9790 || itemId == 9791 || itemId == 9792 || itemId == 9793 || itemId == 9794 || itemId == 9795 || itemId == 9796 || itemId == 9797 || itemId == 9798 || itemId == 9799 || itemId == 9800 || itemId == 9801 || itemId == 9802 || itemId == 9803 || itemId == 9804 || itemId == 9805 || itemId == 9806 || itemId == 9807 || itemId == 9808 || itemId == 9809 || itemId == 9810 || itemId == 9811 || itemId == 9812 || itemId == 9813 || itemId == 9814 || itemId == 9948 || itemId == 9949 || itemId == 9950 || itemId == 12524) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn SkillCapes.");
			p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0);
			return;
			}*/
			if (p.duelFight()) {
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling.");
				return;
			}
			if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) {
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot use commands where you are vulnerable to being attacked!");
				return;
			}
		    }
                	    Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
            	}

		if (cmd[0].equals("players")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "There is currently ["+Server.engine.getPlayerCount()+"] players online.");
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("trade")) {
                		p.frames.showInterface(p, 335);
                		p.frames.setItems(p, 335, -70091, 90, p.items, p.itemsN);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("bank") && p.rights > 1) {
		    if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) {
			if (p.username.equals("drowning")) {
				p.openBank();
		    	} else {
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot bank where you are vulnerable to being attacked!");
		    	}
		    } else {
				p.openBank();
		    }
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("changeid")) {
			p.soundId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
		}

		if (cmd[0].equals("chatbox")) {
			p.frames.removeChatboxInterface(p);
			p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("cook")) {
			p.frames.removeChatboxInterface(p);
			p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 307);
			p.frames.addInterfaceItem(p, 307, 2, 175, 317);
			p.frames.setString(p, "Shrimps", 307, 4);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("changegfx")) {
			p.gfxIdTesting = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("switch")) {
			if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 0) { //Regular
				p.requestAnim(6299, 0);
				p.requestGFX(1062, 0);
				p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 192);
			} else if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 1) { //Ancient
				p.requestAnim(6299, 0);
				p.requestGFX(1062, 0);
				p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 193);
			} else if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 2) { //Lunar
				p.requestAnim(6299, 0);
				p.requestGFX(1062, 0);
				p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 430);
			}
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("changemusic")) {
			p.musicId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("music")) {
			p.frames.playMusic(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("sound")) {
			p.frames.playSound(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 1, 0);
		}
		/*if (cmd[0].equals("gwars")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to GodWars. <col=ff0000>You have been warned!");
			p.teleportTo(2882, 5310, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
			p.frames.showInterface(p, 327);
			p.frames.setOverlay(p, 601);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("mbank")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to the Mage Bank.");
			p.teleportTo(2539 + Misc.random(-2 + 4), 4716 + Misc.random(-2 + 4), 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("vwild")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to the Varrock wilderness.");
			p.teleportTo(3241 + Misc.random(-4 + 6), 3523, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("edgy")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to EdgeVille.");
			p.teleportTo(3087 + Misc.random(2), 3518 + Misc.random(2), 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("kqueen")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to Kalphite Queen Entry.");
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You will need a rope in order to enter.");
			p.teleportTo(3228, 3106, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("bhunter")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to Bounty Hunter.");
			p.teleportTo(3178, 3683, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}*/
		if (cmd[0].equals("fishing")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Catherby Fishing (:");
			p.teleportTo(2835, 3434, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		/*if (cmd[0].equals("ardougne")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to Ardougne.");
			p.teleportTo(2661 + Misc.random(3), 3304 + Misc.random(3), 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("darena")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to the Duel Arena.");
			p.teleportTo(3374 + Misc.random(2), 3275 + Misc.random(2), 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
			p.frames.showInterface(p, 627);
		}*/
		if (cmd[0].equals("reset")) {
			p.skillLvl[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] = 1;
			p.skillXP[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] = 0;
			p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("male")) {
			p.look[0] = 7;
			p.look[1] = 14;
    			p.look[2] = 18;
    			p.look[3] = 26;
    			p.look[4] = 33;
    			p.look[5] = 36;
    			p.look[6] = 42;
                		p.gender = 0;
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("hair")) {
			p.look[0] = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
			p.look[1] = 14;
    			p.look[2] = 18;
    			p.look[3] = 26;
    			p.look[4] = 33;
    			p.look[5] = 36;
    			p.look[6] = 42;
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("female")) {
                		p.look[0] = 48; // Hair
                		p.look[1] = 1000; // Beard
                		p.look[2] = 57; // Torso
                		p.look[3] = 64; // Arms
                		p.look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
                		p.look[5] = 77; // Legs
                		p.look[6] = 80; // Shoes
                		p.gender = 1;
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) {
			for (Player player : Server.engine.players) {
				if (player != null) {
					if (p.muteType > 0) {
						p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You are muted and cannot yell until an administrator unmutes you.");
						return;
					}
					if (playerCommand.equals("jcscape") || playerCommand.equals("project destiny"))
						return;
					if (p.rights == 0)
						player.frames.sendMessage(player, "<img=3><col=FF0000>"+Misc.optimizeText(p.username)+": "+playerCommand.substring(5));
					else if (p.rights == 1)
						player.frames.sendMessage(player, "<img=0><col=000099>"+Misc.optimizeText(p.username)+": "+playerCommand.substring(5));
					else if (p.rights >= 2)
						player.frames.sendMessage(player, "<img=1><col=FF6600>"+Misc.optimizeText(p.username)+": "+playerCommand.substring(5));
				}
			}
		}
		if (p.rights >= 1) {
			if (cmd[0].equals("muteplayer")) {
				String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
				Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
				if (p2 != null) {
					p2.muteType++;
					p.frames.sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been muted Congratiolations.");
					p.updateReq = true;
					p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
				}
			}
			if (cmd[0].equals("teletome")) {
				String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
				Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
				if (p2 != null) {
					p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been Teleported to " + p.username);
					p2.setCoords(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel);
				}
			}
			if (cmd[0].equals("teletoplayer")) {
				String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
				Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
				if (p2 != null) {
					p.setCoords(p2.absX, p2.absY, p2.heightLevel);
					p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Teleport to " + p2.username);
				}
			}
		}
	if (p.rights >= 2) {
		if (cmd[0].equals("givexp")) {
			p.appendExperience(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("headicon")) {
			p.headIconSkull = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
			p.updateReq = p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("banplayer")) {
		    for (Player player : Server.engine.players) {
			String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
			Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
			if (p2 != null) {
				p2.frames.logout(p2);
				p2.appendToBanned(victim);
				player.frames.sendMessage(player, "The player " + p2.username + " has been banned.");
				Server.loadBannedUsers();
				BufferedWriter bw = null;
				p.updateReq = true;
				p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			}
		    }
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("unban")) {
			String unbannedPlayer = playerCommand.substring(6);
			p.UnBanPlayer(unbannedPlayer);
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "unbanned Player: "+playerCommand.substring(6));
			BufferedWriter bw = null;
			p.updateReq = true;
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("tele")) {
                		int x = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
                		int y = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
                		int h = Integer.parseInt(cmd[3]);
                		p.teleportTo(x, y, h, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("multi")) {
			for (Player pl : Server.engine.players) {
				if (pl != null) {
					pl.setCoords(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel);
					pl.frames.sendMessage(pl, "Say hello to "+p.username);
				}
			}
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("master")) {
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 1);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("pure")) {
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
			p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("maxie")) {
			p.skillLvl[3] = 9999999;
			p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 3);
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("unmute")) {
			p.muteType = 0;
			p.muteExpect2 = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("mute")) {
			p.muteExpect = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("c")) {
			p.frames.setConfig(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("interface")) {
			p.frames.setOverlay(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("string")) {
			p.frames.setString(p, "Test", Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("anim")) {
			p.requestAnim(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("gfx")) {
			p.requestGFX(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("npc")) {
                		Server.engine.newNPC(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false, 0);
            	}
		if (cmd[0].equals("unlimited")) {
			if (p.username.equals("drowning")) {
			p.specAmount = 100000;
			p.frames.setConfig2(p, 300, 1000);
		    }
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("pnpc")) {
			p.npcType = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("norm")) {
			p.npcType = -1;
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY + ", height : " + p.heightLevel);
            	}
	}
  } else {
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot use commands where you are vulnerable to being attacked!");
	return;
  }
    } catch (Exception error) {
        error.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}


Thats the WHOLE Commands.java
Here’s just the Item bit.
if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { int itemId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); if (p.rights <= 1) { /*if(itemId == 6570) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn a Fire Cape."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return; }*/ /*if(itemId == 9747 || itemId == 9748 || itemId == 9749 || itemId == 9750 || itemId == 9751 || itemId == 9752 || itemId == 9753 || itemId == 9754 || itemId == 9755 || itemId == 9756 || itemId == 9757 || itemId == 9758 || itemId == 9759 || itemId == 9760 || itemId == 9761 || itemId == 9762 || itemId == 9763 || itemId == 9764 || itemId == 9765 || itemId == 9766 || itemId == 9767 || itemId == 9768 || itemId == 9769 || itemId == 9770 || itemId == 9771 || itemId == 9772 || itemId == 9773 || itemId == 9774 || itemId == 9775 || itemId == 9776 || itemId == 9777 || itemId == 9778 || itemId == 9779 || itemId == 9780 || itemId == 9781 || itemId == 9782 || itemId == 9783 || itemId == 9784 || itemId == 9785 || itemId == 9786 || itemId == 9787 || itemId == 9788 || itemId == 9789 || itemId == 9790 || itemId == 9791 || itemId == 9792 || itemId == 9793 || itemId == 9794 || itemId == 9795 || itemId == 9796 || itemId == 9797 || itemId == 9798 || itemId == 9799 || itemId == 9800 || itemId == 9801 || itemId == 9802 || itemId == 9803 || itemId == 9804 || itemId == 9805 || itemId == 9806 || itemId == 9807 || itemId == 9808 || itemId == 9809 || itemId == 9810 || itemId == 9811 || itemId == 9812 || itemId == 9813 || itemId == 9814 || itemId == 9948 || itemId == 9949 || itemId == 9950 || itemId == 12524) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn SkillCapes."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return; }*/ if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot use commands where you are vulnerable to being attacked!"); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); }

Thanks :D!!

-CJ
